image.caption: Indulge and re-energize in the Spa at Travaasa Austin.
With a variety of massages, cloud nine is always at hand.
An experience that recaptures the magic of travel.

The location of Travaasa Austin alone will inspire you. Surrounded by the ancient live oaks and undulating hills of the Balcones Canyonlands Preserve, our resort embraces nature … and is embraced by nature in return.

But this isn’t just another resort.

As Texas's most active destination resort and spa, Travaasa Austin takes pride in offering its guests a compelling menu of inclusive guided adventures, culinary classes, cultural encounters, healing spa treatments, and fitness and wellness workshops, all located in a Zen-like preserve for the soul.

page.h1: Staying at Travaasa Austin: Rates & Packages
page.copy:
Travaasa Resort & Spa provides you with different rate and package selections so that you can make the most of your time with us. These special offerings are designed to customize your journey.

Total Travaasa

Treat yourself to the Total Travaasa package when you don't want to worry about a thing.
Arrive, relax and enjoy.

Total Travaasa includes:

  • A daily $125 resort credit good towards spa, private class or a round of golf
  • Three "farm-to-table" meals per day prepared by the Travaasa Culinary Team
  • All snacks and non-alcoholic beverages
  • All regularly scheduled on-property programs & activities including yoga, equine encounters, challenge course, culinary classes and more
  • Spacious, well-appointed accommodations featuring organic cotton linens
  • Full access to Travaasa Austin's extensive resort amenities including the 24-hour fitness center featuring FreeMotion™ fitness equipment and free weights; Full-use of the infinity edge swimming pool overlooking Lake Travis and the Texas Hill Country; extensive spa facilities and quiet room; and access to the private, Twin Creeks Country Club championship Fred Couples Signature Golf Course
  • Complimentary Wi-Fi

  • Minimum 8 girls / 4 rooms - Cheese plate & two bottles of champagne
  • Minimum 10 girls / 5 rooms on Total Travaasa Package - Complimentary Travaasa Robes for each guest

Call 1-855-TO-TRAVAASA or email us at austin@travaasa.com to plan your girls' getaway.

Spa Packages

Looking for a day visit to The Spa at Travaasa? Visit Spa Rates & Packages to view available options.

the fine print

• There is no minimum length of stay required to book an inclusive package.
• Premium activities and private sessions may be purchased on an individual basis.
• Travaasa Austin requires that all guests be 16 and older.
• An advance deposit of one night is required to guarantee your reservation. Advance deposit becomes non-refundable 10 days prior to arrival date of your reservation.
• All rates are per person, per night.
• Rates are exclusive of applicable taxes and an 18% daily service charge. The service charge is designed to cover access to regularly scheduled experiences and classes, local phone calls, access to fitness center, resort facilities, self parking and gratuities on all package components.
• Travaasa Austin is a non-tipping resort property.
• Travaasa Austin does not allow smoking on property.
CANCELLATION POLICY: All cancellations must be made at least 10 days before arrival date of reservation to receive refund of your advance deposit.

page.title: Austin Experiences

meta.pageTitle: What to Do, Guided Activities, Austin Experiences | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Experience Austin and the Texas Hill Country at the Travaasa Austin. What is there to do? Guided activities include adventures, culinary and cultural odysseys, and fitness/yoga/wellness programs.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure, cultural travel, culinary, fitness, wellness, all-inclusive, yoga, spa vacations, what to do

page.copy:
You want to embark on a journey without living out of a suitcase. You want to taste real Texas flavors, learn a few new things about yourself, and dance the night away under a banner of stars.

Why not stay at a resort that allows you to have all of these things?

At Travaasa Austin, we get it, and that’s why we created a menu of custom, personalized and authentic experiences just for you. Situated on the edge of the Balcones Canyonlands Preserve, Travaasa Austin offers an extensive selection of guided activities set amidst — and inspired by — the rugged yet hospitable nature of Texas Hill Country.

Here you will experience so many new things: how to Texas Two-Step, how to overcome your inhibitions on the Prickly Pear Challenge Course, and how to embrace your intuition through a sunrise horseback ride.

At Travaasa Austin, you will never run out of things to do.

Experiences are offered through all-inclusive packages as well as a la carte pricing, depending on the path you choose. See our rates and packages for details.

page.title: Adventure

meta.pageTitle: Adventure by Travaasa Austin | Active All-Inclusive Experiences
meta.description: Adventure by Travaasa Austin takes full advantage of the Texas Hill Country. Climb our challenge course, enjoy equine encounters, or go for a nature hike.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure

page.copy: Our Austin Adventure experiences take full advantage of the natural beauty of the Texas Hill Country and our temperate climate. Whether it's an unparalleled view flying over the treetops of the Balcones Canyonlands Preserve on the Prickly Pear Challenge Course's dual zip line, a heightened sense of self-awareness during an equine encounter at the stables, or discovering a little tranquility on the paths of our sunrise and sunset hikes, an unique adventure awaits every guest of Travaasa Austin.
page.imageCaption: Travel should be an adventure.

page.title: Culinary

meta.pageTitle: Culinary Overview
meta.description: Travaasa culinary offers a range of classes, from basic culinary skills and advice on making healthy choices at the market to new recipes steeped in local tradition.
meta.keywords: culinary, cooking, food, nutrition, healthy, travaasa

page.copy: With the emphasis on locally sourced, organic food, and a focus on healthy eating, Travaasa Austin brings you a well-rounded culinary program that offers everything from basic culinary skills to a Tastings class that stimulates your palate with everything from regional recipes to tea flights. Or learn how to navigate your way around the market—no mean feat in these days of über selection. Sample for yourself some of our scintillating selections.
page.imageCaption: Cooking demos that will set your palate on fire.

page.title: Culture

meta.pageTitle: Culture Overview
meta.description: Explore surroundings, immerse yourself learning new skills and allow for moments that renew and challenge.
meta.keywords: travaasa, enrichment, cultures, foods, austin

page.copy: When we talk about our range of experiences (our “Travaasas”) that do everything from feed the soul to get your heart racing, nowhere is that range more diverse than our Austin Culture classes, series and conversations. Take advantage of our unique location to delve into our Ecology series that takes a look at birds, bees, butterflies, native plants and flowers, and even the healing properties of herbs. Or go back home to California confident in your Texas Two-Step capabilities. For more ruminative sorts, try journaling, nature photography or drawing. And everyone loves ending the evening around our fire pit, lost in conversation and laughter.
page.imageCaption: Explore the world with our Culture Travaasas.

page.title: Fitness

meta.pageTitle: Fitness Overview
meta.description: Travaasa fitness focuses on balance, core work and flexibility.
meta.keywords: fitness, strengthening, balance, core, flexibility, agile, strength, travaasa, austin

page.copy: Fitness Travaasa Austin-style encompasses everything from aquatic yoga to Dance Fitness. And just to give you a taste of that “everything,” imagine being able to take six different yoga classes from renowned yoga experts, pilates and foam rollers... even take a ride on the mechanical bull as an exciting end to a core workout! You can also enjoy our outdoor circuit, which makes exercise not just about breathing properly, but also breathtaking as you take in the surrounding scenery.
page.imageCaption: Let your inner agile child shine with our Fitness Travaasas.

page.title: Wellness

meta.pageTitle: Wellness Overview
meta.description: Travaasa spa workshops include meditation, stretch, posture and breath work.
meta.keywords: wellness, meditation, stretch, health, workshops, travaasa, spa

page.copy: Our Austin Spa and Wellness Travaasas focus on mind, body and spirit with meditation offerings to help you decompress or recharge, Mini Med classes that look at the relationship between our inner workings and our outer façade, and spirited “moving meditations” like Chi Gong and I Chi Flow. Take something from each for a well-rounded Travaasa experience.
page.imageCaption: These Travaasas are like a wellness toolkit.

page.title: Adventure

meta.pageTitle: Adventure

meta.keywords: adventure, equine, hiking, hike, challenge course, climbing wall, travaasa, austin

page.copy: Our Austin Adventure experiences take full advantage of the natural beauty of the Texas Hill Country and our temperate climate. Whether it's an unparalleled view flying over the treetops of the Balcones Canyonlands Preserve on the Prickly Pear Challenge Course's dual zip line, a heightened sense of self-awareness during an equine encounter at the stables, or discovering a little tranquility on the paths of our sunrise and sunset hikes, an unique adventure awaits every guest of Travaasa Austin.
page.imageCaption: Adventure and guided experiences

page.title: Prickly Pear Challenge Course

meta.pageTitle: Prickly Pear Challenge Course | Outward Bound | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: The Prickly Pear Challenge Course at Travaasa Austin was designed in collaboration with Outward Bound and is a great place for individuals and groups to conquer their perceived limitations.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure

page.copy:
Ever picked a prickly pear? If you have, you know the importance of each foot and hand placement as you find your way between the cactus needles. The same focus on movement is required as you navigate the space above the trees on our challenge course. Our state-of-the-art course was designed in partnership with Outward Bound Professional, and incorporates vertical climbing elements for a wide range of physical ability. Begin at the Cob Web, progress over Raider Bridge, through the Flying V, to navigate Double Trouble. The linear progression of the course culminates with a fantastic flight of over 250 feet long, soaring over the tree tops.

Climbing Wall

Ready to feel exhilarated and have a real sense of accomplishment that you did something out of your comfort zone? Our climbing wall at the Prickly Pear Challenge Course will entertain and test both first timers and experienced climbers alike. You’ll love the feeling of challenging yourself to reach new heights while daring yourself to trust your body and go beyond your (perceived) limitations.

Zipline

There's no other feeling like that of a zip line—the sensation of flying and the freedom afforded by your journey down the cable—is at once exhilarating and empowering. At Travaasa Austin, the linear progression of our course culminates with a fantastic dual zip line flight over 250 feet long, soaring above the tree tops.

Partner Overview: Outward Bound Professional

For more than 60 years, Outward Bound has proven that they are simply the best at what they do as the premier adventure-based education program in the world. Most people know that Outward Bound has a nationwide system of wilderness courses, community-centric and special programming, but many may not be familiar with the Outward Bound Professional program, whose goal is to create positive, lasting change in the workplace through innovative, customized programs that enhance the effectiveness of individuals, groups and organizations. Travaasa celebrates our partnership with this revered leader in experiential learning and discovery.
page.imageCaption: Our state-of-the-art challenge course.

page.title: Equine Encounters

meta.pageTitle: Equine & Horseback Encounters | Adventure by Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Experience our unique equine interactions where you can learn to project your intentions, Travaasa Austin's equine encounters foster the mind, body and spirit.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure

page.copy:
Develop your self-awareness through close interaction with this intelligent creature and allow our equine team to guide you on a journey of heightened personal understanding. Learn to lead and project your intentions as you are guided by our equine team. No previous horse experience needed for this experience that will teach you how to establish communication with another being through respect, sensitivity and awareness.

Horseback Riding

Riding properly requires constant physical activity by the rider and focus on developing core strength. When you ride a horse the goal is to be more than just a passenger—it's to achieve a bond with the horse. A one-hour riding lesson in the Travaasa Arena with one of our expert cowboys will focus on developing strength while connecting with your horse. These lessons are tailored to your level of skill and interest.

*Horseback Riding lessons are subject to an additional charge. Total Travaasa resort credits may be used toward this activity.
page.imageCaption: Let our equine team guide you on a journey of heightened personal understanding.

page.title: Archery

meta.pageTitle: Archery Lessons & Experiences | Adventure by Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Learn the fundamentals of archery at Travaasa Austin, where you can boost your mental attention and connect your breath to physical performance.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure

page.copy: Learn the fundamentals that create the foundation of archery while boosting your mental attention and connecting your breath to physical performance. Experience techniques to develop your focus, patience, flexibility, concentration, and attention skills and understand why great archers continually develop these simple concepts to heighten all aspects of their lives.
page.imageCaption: Archery develops focus, patience, flexibility and concentration.

page.title: Hiking

meta.pageTitle: Hiking Trails & Experiences | Adventure by Travaasa Austin
meta.description: The extensive network of hiking trails at Travaasa Austin accommodate hikers of all abilities. Join us for a guided walk to explore Texas flora and fauna, or enjoy a special sunrise hike.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure

page.copy:
Hill Country Hike

Even if you don’t think you’re into hiking, you’ll change your mind after you explore our rich and extensive trail system. If you take a guided tour, you’ll learn about local flora, fauna and the history and ecology of the area. Hikes are open to all and accommodate a wide range of interests and abilities. Wear comfortable, supportive shoes and bring water. We have morning, evening and moonlight hikes.

Sunrise Hike

There's something magical about starting your day with a sunrise hike. Your body is refreshed from sleep, and your mind is open to experiencing new and vital things. Feel the fresh morning air on your face and watch the sun rise over the breathtaking landscape of the Balcones Canyonlands and waterscape of Lake Travis.
page.imageCaption: Our rich and extensive trail system.

page.title: Geocaching Adventure

meta.pageTitle: Geocaching Activities | Adventure by Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Learn the fundamentals of high-tech hide-and-seek with a geocaching adventure at Travaasa Austin.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure, gps

page.copy: Geocaching is an outdoor sporting activity, often described as a “game of high-tech hide & seek,” in which the participants use a Global Positioning System (GPS) receiver or other navigational techniques to hide and search out containers, called “geocaches” or “caches” anywhere in the world. And in your case, you’ll have the entire spectacular Travaasa property to explore—discovering and hiding your own caches.
page.imageCaption: Geocaching - high-tech meets hide 'n seek.

page.title: Culinary

meta.pageTitle: Culinary Classes by Travaasa Austin, All-Inclusive Cooking Experiences
meta.description: Explore the flavors of life with our Culinary Classes by Travaasa Austin. From basic culinary skills to wine tasting to healthy regional cuisine, our talented staff will create a memorable learning experience complete with delicious flavors and fun, interactive demos.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, culinary, cuisine, cooking classes, wine tasting

page.copy:
With the emphasis on locally sourced, organic food, and a focus on healthy eating, Travaasa Austin brings you a well-rounded culinary program that offers everything from basic culinary skills to a Tastings class that stimulates your palate with everything from regional recipes to tea flights. Or learn how to navigate your way around the market—a mean feat in these days of über selection. Sample for yourself some of our scintillating selections.


Classes available Fridays and/or Saturdays or by special appointment.
page.imageCaption: Culinary classes and cuisine experiences

page.title: Basic Culinary Skills

meta.pageTitle: Basic Culinary Skills | All-Inclusive Culinary Class | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Overcome your culinary inhibitions at Travaasa Austin with this beginner’s course. Our hands-on cooking demo will teach you the basic skills and techniques you need to master the kitchen.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, culinary, cuisine, cooking classes

page.copy: Our hands-on cooking demos will teach you skills and techniques while showcasing Travaasa house recipes. Let our gourmet culinary team delight you with ways to prepare, cook and present the cuisine you savor.
page.imageCaption: Hands-on cooking demos.

page.title: Group Cooking Demo

meta.pageTitle: Group Cooking Demo | Culinary Class | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Each day, we offer a group cooking demo focused on a single ingredient, technique or combination of the two. Join us in this fun, group setting.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, culinary, cuisine, cooking classes

page.copy: You know those enviable people who make entertaining look so easy, and preparing recipes so effortless? After this culinary adventure, you’ll be one of them as you whip up tempting appetizers, perfect the art of the cocktail and learn how to create a memorable meal through layering different tastes and textures.
page.imageCaption: Group Cooking Demo with Chef Ben.

page.title: Juicing 2.0

meta.pageTitle: Juicing 2.0 | All-Inclusive Culinary Class | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: From organic smoothie to super juices to potent soups, take you juicing skills to the next level with this Travaasa Austin culinary class.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, culinary, cuisine, cooking classes

page.copy:
Most have tried juicing before. And promptly quit because of the slopping, mopping and chopping. Enter our Juicing 2.0 experience. This isn't juicing from another era.

Instead, we bring you an interactive meal-making program that uses a blender and fresh, whole food as its culinary crayon box. This is a hands-on, experiential class that provides a novel way to discover the exciting possibilities of food. We use whole foods to blend, juice and mix into fresh whole juices, hot soups, ice cream, salsas, dips, spreads and desserts... all from scratch. And all delicious.
page.imageCaption: Juicing like you've never tasted before.

page.title: Tastings

meta.pageTitle: Wine Tasting | All-Inclusive Culinary Class | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Learn to identify the nuances and hidden flavors of wine with this special wine tasting class at Travaasa Austin.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, culinary, cuisine, cooking classes

page.copy:
Sip. Surrender. Savor. Wine appreciation can sound daunting and complicated. Let us step in with this experience that “undaunts” and underscores all the important things you need to know and understand about enjoying wine. First of all, wine is not just about knowing what you like. There is a difference between objective quality and subjective enjoyment. So let yourself surrender to different tastes you might never get to experience again.


We'll start with the bottle itself. Much of the magic of wine lies in being able to properly evaluate bottles, which in turn can lead to an understanding of wine's history and origins. Then we'll move on to learning the skill of wine appreciation by tasting and evaluating wines with experts in the field (top wines can come from many regions, but they all have certain characteristics in common). You'll learn how to analyze the various flavors, aromas and textures of grapes, and you'll have a chance to taste quality wines, which will be provided along with water and appropriate snacks.


*Additional fee applies.
page.imageCaption: As we always say, the educated palate is a happy (and satisfied) palate.

page.title: Culture

meta.pageTitle: Culture by Travaasa Austin | All-Inclusive Cultural Travel Experiences
meta.description: Explore the culture of Texas at Travaasa Austin, with this series of cultural travel experiences, including Texas Two-Step and Harmonica lessons.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, cultural travel

page.copy: When we talk about our range of experiences that do everything from feed the soul to get your heart racing, nowhere is that range more diverse than our Austin Culture classes, series and conversations. Take advantage of our unique location to delve into our Ecology series that takes a look at birds, bees, butterflies, native plants and flowers, and even the healing properties of herbs. Or go back home to California confident in your Texas Two-Step capabilities. For more ruminative sorts, try journaling or drawing. And everyone loves ending the evening around our fire pit, lost in conversation and laughter.
page.imageCaption: Cultural travel experiences

page.title: Texas Two-Step

meta.pageTitle: Learn the Texas Two-Step, Cultural Travel Experiences, Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Learn how to dance the Texas Two-Step at Travaasa Austin, in this instructive class.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, cultural travel

page.copy: The Texas Two-Step includes three steps: a quick step, a quick step, and then a slow step. The lead steps forward on his left foot, lifting his right heel for the first step, which is the first quick step. It can be danced to music with either a 2/4 or 4/4 time signature. And best of all? It doesn’t have to be done just in Texas, which means you’ve got a whole new skill to show off to friends when you go home, or a new weekend get-together idea.
page.imageCaption: The best place to learn the Texas Two-Step? Texas.

page.title: Ecology Series

meta.pageTitle: Local Ecology Hike | Adventure by Travaasa Austin
meta.description: The extensive network of hiking trails at Travaasa Austin are the perfect place to learn about our local, Texas flora and fauna.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure

page.copy:
Travaasa Austin is situated within 210 acres of the Balcones Canyonlands Preserve—a migratory landing spot for two federally endangered migratory species, the Black-capped Vireo and the Golden-cheeked Warbler. It’s also home to plants only native to this area. In this series, you’ll learn about native flora and fauna and also learn about the many healing properties of plants.

Choose one, or take all three:

  • Birds, Bees and Butterflies
  • Healing Properties of Herbs/Plants
  • Native Plants & Flowers
page.imageCaption: Learn about native Texan flora and fauna.

page.title: Learning Harmonica

meta.pageTitle: Learn Harmonica | Cultural Travel Experiences | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Learn how to play the quintessential Texas musical instrument — the harmonica. The instructors at Travaasa Austin will teach you the basics to make simple, fun harmonies.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, cultural travel

page.copy: Not just for cowhands, the harmonica allows the musically challenged to begin enjoying the benefits of music within just a few hours. You do not have to know how to read music to begin playing the harmonica. All you need is a tune in your head, because in some ways it is much like humming or whistling. In just a short time, everything clicks and it becomes as natural as whistling. You just sing your music through your harmonica without thinking about the numbered holes and whether you blow or draw.
page.imageCaption: Discover why we say anyone can learn harmonica.

page.title: Journaling

meta.pageTitle: Journaling
meta.description: Journaling at Travaasa includes creative ways to write your story.
meta.keywords: travaasa, journaling, austin

page.copy: Journaling is one of the best ways to release the tension of the day (all while creating a document of your life). It’s pleasurable, easy, and all you need is a writing implement and a piece of paper—or a laptop if you’re the kind of person who thinks faster than they can write. Our journaling experience is low-pressure while we give you fun and creative ways to think about writing your story.
page.imageCaption: Write your own story at Travaasa.

page.title: Sketch and Draw

meta.pageTitle: Sketch & Draw
meta.description: Unleash your creative self at Travaasa with sketching and drawing classes.
meta.keywords: travaasa, sketch, draw, austin

page.copy: It’s been said that within each of us is a creative being just longing to get out. At Travaasa, we believe that. That’s why we offer you pressure-free ways to release your inner creative and focus your soul through your choice of artistic outlet. Best of all? No experience or talent is needed to create something amazing that you can bring home to remind you of your Travaasa journey.
page.imageCaption: Let your creativity shine.

page.title: Vision Boarding

meta.pageTitle: Vision Boarding
meta.description: Make your vision or dream happen with this visualization tool that manifests your dreams into reality.
meta.keywords: travaasa, vision, boarding, exercise, austin

page.copy: Do you have a vision? Or a dream? This is the workshop that can help you make it happen. A vision board is a simple yet powerful visualization tool that uses the universal law of attraction to begin manifesting your dreams into reality. This is an exercise in putting energy toward what you DO want in life, not what you don’t want. Do this exercise and see what happens. You’ll be surprised by the results.
page.imageCaption: Put your energy toward what you want in life.

page.title: Evening Fireside Chats

meta.pageTitle: Evening Fire-Side Chats | Cultural Travel Experiences, Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Each night at Travaasa Austin, we have an evening fire-side chat where you can share your experiences and meet other guests.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, cultural travel

page.copy: At Travaasa Austin, we want to offer you a comforting and convivial way to end the evening. Around our firepit (outside) or fireside (inside) a nightly gathering as guests talk, laugh and share the day’s memories. It’s a friendly environment that allows you to get to know your fellow guests and the staff a little bit better. Whatever we do, whether it’s sharing stories, roasting marshmallows, or an impromptu music jam, every night will be a little bit different and a whole lot of fun.
page.imageCaption: Enjoy a nightly gathering around our fire pit.

page.title: Fitness

meta.pageTitle: Fitness by Travaasa Austin | Active All-Inclusive Experiences

page.title: Yoga for Mind and Body

meta.pageTitle: Yoga Classes | All-Inclusive Fitness Experiences | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Practice an assortment of yoga styles — including Bhava and Hatha — at Travaasa Austin.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, fitness, workout, exercise

page.copy:
Yoga is a wonderful technique to heal, detoxify and unify your mind and body. It can help fortify your awareness of movement, balance and intention, in addition to strengthening your body (through vinyasa yoga). No matter your age, strength or flexibility level, anyone can do yoga with the right attitude and the right teacher. And if you are new to yoga, you’ll find a physical path that harmonizes mind, body and soul. Yoga combines physical activity with breath to reduce stress, control weight, relieve lower back pain and enhance focus. Our yoga classes include various styles and routines that create a dynamic, challenging program which combines strength, spirituality and a healthy dose of sweat.

Yoga: Aquatic

Practicing yoga in the water can provide a number of benefits. First of all, it feels great. The wiggly-waggly way water feels when you bend and stretch will have you experiencing childhood again. But water also acts as a safeguard against injuries that are more likely to occur on land. Your movements become smoother in water and therefore your body will not experience the same strain as on terra firma. There are a few poses which are even easier practiced in water, such as the standing eagle pose or tree pose. You can perform these effortlessly in water because the ripples that are created in the water force your body to maintain the necessary pose.

Yoga: Awakening the Joints

This is a “must-do” if you sometimes feel aches and pains in your ankles, knees, elbows, wrists, shoulders and hips. And if you’re over the age of 30, you know what we mean. In this class we focus on yoga postures and stretches to bring greater movement to the body through awakening and stimulating stiff joints. And all without having to dip into the Glucosamine and Chondroitin.

Yoga: Bhava

Envisoned by Travaasa yoga expert Susan Anderson, Bhava yoga invites us to connect with the world beyond ourselves. The word Bhava loosely translates to "An expansion of feeling and sentiment in the heart through song and chant" and Bhava can transform you, but it calls for the surrender of your ego and sense of self. Join us for a unique yoga experience that will alter the way you think about yoga.

Yoga: Hatha (All Levels)

Wake up your body and mind with this flowing yoga practice that accommodates all levels of practitioners. Energize yourself with traditional morning Sun Salutations (a linking of breath and motion) and other Hatha yoga poses. This is a low-to-moderate-intensity class, geared towards everyone with an interest in yoga, and will allow those who are newer to take their time, while letting seasoned practitioners pick up the intensity.

Yoga: Spine Work

One of the most important factors in maintaining a healthy body is a flexible spine. Yogis say that youth is determined by the flexibility of your spine (which means, with a physically sound spine, 50 might really be the new 30). Lower back pain and upper back stress are some of the most common health complaints of adults. The best way to avoid backaches is to take care of your spine on a daily basis. There is no quick fix for back pain, but our exercise set is an effective maintenance program. In this class we practice a combination of back bends and forward bends to strengthen and bring flexibility to the spine. We will also learn some gentle stretches you can do on your own to relieve and prevent back pain.
page.imageCaption: Yoga heals, detoxifies and unifies your mind and body.

page.title: Mechanical Bull Riding Workout

meta.pageTitle: Mechanical Bull Riding Workout | Fitness Experiences | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Looking for a new way to workout your core? How about riding a mechanical bull? Guests of the Travaasa Austin are free to give it a shot.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, fitness, workout, exercise

page.copy: You probably didn’t see this one coming, but you are in Austin, after all. After you’ve gotten your muscles primed with pilates or our core conditioning class, graduate to our mechanical bull for a core workout that’s unlike anything you’ve ever experienced. Riding the bull increases strength and improves flexibility because it’s continually moving—up, down, right and left—purposely keeping you off-balance. It’s a ride that forces you to use your leg muscles to grip the sides of the bull, and your core muscles to flex as you move forward and back. And lastly, form does count, so don’t forget to raise one arm up in the air to maintain your balance (bonus points if you have a cowboy hat). And you thought cowboys were just being cool waving their hats around in the air!
page.imageCaption: The ultimate core workout.

meta.pageTitle: Outdoor Circuit | All-Inclusive Fitness Experiences | Travaasa Austin

page.copy: Spice up your workouts with our outdoor circuit workout that will take you through some tough intervals that make your heart rate soar. Circuit training is a refreshing exercise that provides excellent, all-around fitness, tone and strength. Best of all, you get maximum results in a minimum amount of time. By mixing up the moves and changing the intensity throughout the workout, you’ll keep your body challenged and your mind interested—and that’s half the battle when you’re trying to motivate yourself to exercise.

page.title: Breath Work

meta.pageTitle: Breath Work
meta.description: Breath work at Travaasa releases us from stress and anxiety to bring a calmer, more relaxed state.
meta.keywords: travaasa, restorative, breathing, breath, stress, anxiety, calm, austin

page.copy: Who knew that focusing on something we do unconsciously every second of every day can do so much more for us? This class works with the breath, following its movements through the body. Restorative sequencing moves us slowly into a deep somatic experience to release us from stress and anxiety and bring about a calmer, more relaxed state (great for type-A personalities who have trouble relaxing). As we turn the lens inward, we will learn more about the asana—the breath—and ourselves.
page.imageCaption: Great for Type-A personalities who have trouble relaxing.

page.title: Meditation

meta.pageTitle: Meditation
meta.description: Meditation starts with guided practice and the use of Chakra Points to learn acceptance and letting go.
meta.keywords: travaasa, meditation, guided, chakra, austin

page.copy:
Meditation is a wonderful way to decompress after a stressful day—or to start your day in a calming state of mind. We offer three different points of view on meditation, and all are easy to learn and incorporate into your daily life.

Meditation: Wake-Up

Start your morning with a meditation experience designed to get your day off to a balanced start.

Meditation: Chakra

Within our bodies there are focal points of energy that we use (whether consciously or unconsciously), to allow us to fully experience and realize events that unfold before us. These focal points of energy are called Chakras. The word Chakra is Sanskrit for "wheel," and there are seven primary Chakra points in the body—each like a moving wheel of energy, ready to help you tune out, and tune into yourself. When one chakra center is out of balance, you are out of balance. Balance the chakra centers through meditation, and you will feel balanced throughout your day.

Meditation: Guided

In this class, we help demystify the ancient practice of meditation—bringing awareness to our moment-to-moment experiences. This simple—but not easy—practice of acceptance, letting go, non-striving, and suspension of the judgmental mind leaves us with a deep sense of openness and receptivity to ourselves, to others and to the moment as it unfolds.
page.imageCaption: Relax, renew, discover yourself.

page.title: The Spa at Travaasa Austin

meta.pageTitle: Austin Spa Resort & Hotel | Day Spa | The Spa at Travaasa Austin
meta.description: The Spa at Travaasa Austin gives guests an unparalleled experience in relaxation and rejuvenation, with detoxifying body treatments, massage and holistic healing.
meta.keywords: Austin spa, Travaasa, Austin, Texas, Hill Country, resort, Texas spa, day spa, spas, boutique spa resorts, body treatments, massage, facials, packages, rates, all-inclusive, spa vacation

page.copy:
A visit to The Spa at Travaasa Austin goes far beyond pampering and indulgence. Our treatments reflect our passion for, and knowledge of, the human body and the ability of plants and essential oils to naturally treat, heal and revitalize the soul. Featuring 11 treatment rooms, including a couple’s room, as well as a hot tub and dry sauna, the spa sits adjacent to the property’s infinity pool, which overlooks the serene and scenic hill country landscape.

We offer an array of massages, healing rituals, beauty treatments and personalized services, using only organic, bioenergetic products, including the Primavera and Anakiri skin care lines, which are also available in our Spa Boutique.

The Spa at Travaasa is a retreat for both overnight and day guests offering a comprehensive menu of treatments.


Spa Guide
page.imageCaption: Discover spa treatments that go far beyond pampering.

page.title: Spa Reservations

meta.pageTitle: Austin Spa Resort & Hotel | Day Spa | Reservations | The Spa at Travaasa Austin
meta.description: The Spa at Travaasa Austin offers detoxifying body treatments, massage and holistic healing. Reserve your session with us today.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, Hill Country, resort, Austin spa, Texas spa, day spa, spas, boutique spa resorts, body treatments, massage, facials, packages, rates, all-inclusive, spa vacation

page.copy:
To make reservations for a spa treatment or spa package, plan a spa retreat, or inquire about a customized wellness program, please call 512-225-1075 or toll-free at 855-TO-TRAVAASA (855-868-7282).

We encourage you to schedule your appointment in advance to ensure availability of treatments during your visit. We want your spa experience to be stress-free and relaxing. To help make your experience as enjoyable as possible, please consider the following before you arrive.

  • When scheduling treatments, please let us know if you prefer a male or female therapist.
  • Should you need to cancel, please do so within 24 hours as no-shows will be charged for a full treatment.
  • Any changes within 6 hours of your scheduled appointment will be charged at 50% of full service price.
  • Shaving or waxing just prior to a treatment that includes a scrub is not recommended.
  • Please arrive a minimum of 30 minutes prior to your treatment time to begin the relaxation process, and allow time to change into your spa robe and slippers. Late arrivals may receive a reduced treatment time.
  • Please turn off all cell phones during your spa visit.
  • Travaasa does not accept children under the age of 16.
  • For your convenience, an 18% gratuity will be added to each spa service.
page.imageCaption: Reserve your spot today.

page.title: Holistic Healing

page.copy:
Focusing on the body, mind and spirit, our holistic healing offerings are designed to touch you deeply, both inside and out, giving you a complete experience of well-being.

Energy Balancing & Healing

Experience the art of channeling energy to create a deep state of tranquility on both the physical and spiritual planes. Explore a number of techniques such as Reiki, healing touch, polarity therapy, Pranic Healing and Chakra clearing to balance and heal your internal energy. Each session is unique and tailored to the individual’s needs.
50 or 80 minutes - $125/$170
page.imageCaption: For a complete experience of well-being.

page.title: Watsu

meta.pageTitle: Austin Spa Resort & Hotel | Day Spa | Watsu | The Spa at Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Watsu takes place in our private, body temperature Watsu pool.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, Hill Country, resort, Austin spa, Texas spa, day spa, spas, boutique spa resorts, body treatments, massage, watsu, packages, rates, all-inclusive, spa vacation

page.copy:
Watsu

An extraordinary experience which quiets the mind, relaxes the body, and opens the heart. It is a unique combination of yoga-like stretches, dance-like movement, and massage carried out in our beautiful private salt-water pool. The warm (skin temperature) water creates a quiet, weightless and nurturing environment in which your body is free to move with ease and grace, to relax, unwind, rebalance and heal.
50 minutes – $140


Integrated Aquatic Bodywork

You will have the option of integrating a variety of Aquatic Bodywork techniques to tailor the session to fit your needs. Healing Dance™ begins with movements and stretches similar to Watsu®, then periods of movement are slowly introduced underwater. It is a dynamic experience, allowing the body to stretch and move in unlimited ways, and is a profoundly meditative and transformative experience. Your session can also be customized to address a number of physical conditions.
50 minutes – $140
All sessions require swimsuits.

page.title: Dining

meta.pageTitle: Dining | Restaurant & Dining Experiences | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Fresh, organic and locally sourced ingredients provide the foundation for your dining experience at Jean’s Kitchen, the restaurant at Travaasa Austin.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, hotels, Jean’s Kitchen, dining, organic, The Spur

page.copy:
Our culinary staff is obsessed with two things: nourishing our guests with delicious dishes composed of fresh, organic, and locally sourced ingredients whenever possible; and fostering a sense of community at the table.

It is these two obsessions that make dining at Travaasa Austin so special.

In fact, we named our restaurant Jean's Kitchen, after the mother of one of our founders. Jean Berry was known to say that sharing your day’s story over the kitchen table was always the most magical time of the day. Our executive chef, Benjamin Baker, has taken great strides to not only live up to Jean’s awesome cooking, but to deliver an experience where guests can share their story over breakfast, lunch or dinner.

We encourage you to discover the menu at Jean’s Kitchen.

Dining is included in some packages at Travaasa Austin. See our rates & packages for more.
page.imageCaption: Dining al fresco at Jean’s Kitchen

page.title: Dining Options

meta.pageTitle: Jean’s Kitchen & The Spur | Restaurant & Dining | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Fresh, organic and locally sourced ingredients provide the foundation for your dining experience at Jean’s Kitchen, the restaurant at Travaasa Austin.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, hotels, Jean’s Kitchen, dining, organic, The Spur

page.copy:
Enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner in our dining room, Jean’s Kitchen, and engage in spirited and always unpredictable discussions in the adjacent lounge.

Dining at Travaasa Austin

Executive Chef Ben Baker describes the culinary style of our Austin location as “Bon Vivant Gourmet,” and this fits completely with the Travaasa style—to enjoy life and the bounty of the earth that nourishes us in every sense of the word. Using techniques that range from Classical to Nuevo, he has crafted a menu that he describes as contemporary Austin cuisine. Everything offered at Travaasa Austin incorporates the many layers of influence that are relevant to central Texas today, and keeps in mind the sophisticated palates of this modern, progressive city.

Alongside characteristic Texas fare of BBQ and Tex-Mex, Austinites have a taste for Asian dishes, traditional Native American and Latin American ingredients and Old World European recipes. At Travaasa we mix it all up to create familiar and unique dishes for our guests. Austin is also a health-conscious city with lots of vegetarian options, and that’s why we also offer an extensive selection of gourmet vegetarian and vegan foods made from scratch with health and balance in mind.

When you stay with us, you can expect to savor the flavors of our own Texas Onion Soup—served with rich, nutty Manchego cheese melted on homemade sourdough bread; orange juice and tequila-reduced pork tamales; pan-seared hamachi with a white wine sauce finished with grapes or locally raised, grain-fed pork chops with creamy polenta; squash ribbons and an orange chipotle glaze. Mmm, we’re getting hungry already.
page.imageCaption: Jean's Kitchen, our main dining room.

page.title: Executive Chef, Benjamin Baker

meta.pageTitle: Executive Chef Benjamin Baker | Jean's Kitchen, Dining Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Meet Benjamin Baker the talented executive chef of Jean's Kitchen at Travaasa Austin.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, hotels, Jean’s Kitchen, dining, organic, The Spur

page.copy:
When Chef Benjamin Baker accepted the position as executive chef at Travaasa, he brought the tools he valued most to his new job—a good attitude, a set of knives and a 167-year-old sourdough starter. With his passion for baking breads and pastries and a dedication to seasonal, organic and local ingredients, Chef Baker is revolutionizing Travaasa cuisine.

Modestly, he gives credit to his sourdough starter that is used in many of his baked goods, but after cooking in kitchens from Maui, HI, to San Jose, CA, to Austin, TX, Baker’s two decades of experience have resulted in a distinctive and celebrated culinary style winning raves at Travaasa.

"I love nourishing people and introducing our guests to new flavors in a creative way,” said Baker. “We’re celebrating food in its most natural form with an emphasis on organic, seasonal and local ingredients."
page.imageCaption: Chef Ben brought a 167-year-old sourdough starter with him to Travaasa Austin.

page.sitemapTitle: JEAN BERRY, NAMESAKE OF JEAN’S KITCHEN
page.title: Jean Berry, Namesake of Jean’s Kitchen

meta.pageTitle: Jean Berry, The Inspiration for Jean's Kitchen | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: Learn about the inspiration for Jean's Kitchen at Travaasa Austin, Jean Berry.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Texas, hotels, Jean’s Kitchen, dining, organic, The Spur

page.h1: Jean Berry, The Inspiration for Jean's Kitchen
page.copy:
Jean Berry's life was the epitome of the Travaasa spirit in travel, food and fun. Besides enjoying good food from around the world, she loved to cook, especially for others. Her ordinary life as a wife, mother, and friend gave her the opportunity to experiment, perfect, and make several types and kinds of food. Her meals and dishes became extraordinary because she used ideal ingredients and made just about everything from scratch.

Although Jean's parents were Americans, they lived in Mexico at the time of her birth and traveled to EI Paso to have their baby in a more modern American hospital. She then spent her childhood in Chicago and Denver, working in the family creamery as a teenager. She married and eventually established her family in Phoenix, Arizona.

She loved to travel and see and learn about new places and cultures. She also had a passion for Italian food, and made her gnocchi, which became a family favorite, by hand. She went through an "Asian" phase and besides stir fry dishes, she made pot stickers and a variety of egg rolls. Once, when she made her Mexican green chili, she peeled so many chili peppers her hands blistered the next day. Her extraordinary drive and joyful attitude spurned her to compile and help publish several church cookbooks for the ordinary cook to benefit from her expertise. Her most famous dish, a meat pie, became a request of all potlucks and published in the local paper.

Always with a smile, always with open arms and hugs, Jean was an ordinary woman with an extraordinary spirit, and the character of Travaasa.
page.imageCaption: Jean Berry epitomizes the Travaasa spirit.

page.title: Libations

meta.pageTitle: Libations
meta.description: Travaasa culinary offers a range of classes, from basic culinary skills and advice on making healthy choices at the market to new recipes steeped in local tradition.
meta.keywords: culinary, cooking, food, nutrition, healthy, travaasa

page.copy:
Our wine list mirrors Travaasa’s environmental values by featuring organic, biodynamic and sustainable wines made by boutique producers. The practice of biodynamics in winemaking has been gaining in popularity and biodynamic winemakers have noted stronger, clearer, more vibrant tastes, as well as wines that remain drinkable longer.

We also keep it local by featuring the very best Texas wines, and offer a lot of fun wines that you don’t see very often elsewhere (for instance, Inwood Estates Vinyards from Florence, Texas). Join us weekly for wine tastings or seasonally for winemaker dinners. Our beer list is similar, featuring many of Texas’s great craft brewers and imported organic brews. We even have a great gluten-free Belgian ale. Our coffees and teas are also organic and from local companies.
page.imageCaption: Organic, biodynamic wines, craft beers and organic coffee and teas await.

page.h1: Canyon Room Accommodations at Travaasa Austin
page.copy:
Imagine waking up with the golden sun as it rises over the live oaks of the Texas Hill Country. Outside your plush and comfortable room, warblers are singing from the nearby trees, and a day of adventures and culinary experiences await you. Maybe you’ll unfurl the yoga mat provided for you in your room and partake in a private sun salutation. Or maybe you’ll just tuck back into the organic linens and sleep-in to the sound of the chirping birds.

This is the essence of staying in one of Travaasa Austin’s Canyon Rooms.

page.copy:
Contact sales at 512-334-4649 or austinsales@travaasa.com

Travaasa sits nestled in 210 acres of the Balcones Canyonlands Preserve overlooking beautiful Lake Travis just 30 minutes from downtown Austin. There are 70 guestrooms located within seven buildings set along meandering paths with scenic Texas Hill Country views. The property includes horse stables, a challenge course, a state-of-the-art fitness center, a tranquil spa with infinity edge pool, a beautifully appointed dining area with an exhibition kitchen, and an outdoor patio with sunset views.

A New Type of Destination Hotel

Travaasa is an ideal location for Corporate Meetings and Executive Retreats. The boutique hotel property boasts invigorating group activities and team building, regional culinary experiences, and authentic customizable meetings.

Austin Bergstrom International Airport is easily accessible with nonstop and direct flights from numerous cities. With Austin’s warm and sunny climate, Travaasa is the perfect setting year-round.

page.sitemapTitle: A PERFECT DAY AT TRAVAASA AUSTIN
page.title: A Perfect Day at Travaasa

meta.pageTitle: A Perfect Day at Travaasa Austin | Things to Do | Travaasa Austin
meta.description: A perfect day at Travaasa Austin includes visiting the spa, taking a yoga class, hiking the Hill Country, and savoring delicious cuisine.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, Austin, Maui, Hawaii, boutique spa resorts, hotels, guided activities, adventure, cultural travel, culinary, fitness, wellness, all-inclusive, yoga, spa vacations, what to do, beach, snorkeling,

page.h1: A Perfect Day at Travaasa Austin
page.copy:
Picture this: a complete day of serenity, curiosity, activity, delicious food and relaxation. Sound good? Here’s what a perfect day at Travaasa Austin looks like.

7:00am

Wake up to the sound of bird song outside your deluxe Canyon Room. Make a little morning tea or coffee, and savor the peace and tranquility from your balcony.

7:30am

Join us for a sunrise hike. We’ll stroll across our property and through the beautiful Balcones Canyonlands.

8:30am

After an invigorating walk, savor a hearty yet healthy breakfast at Jean's Kitchen. After all, you’ve already earned it.

10:00am

By mid-morning, you’ll be ready to get back outside. Head to the stables and enjoy a A guided equine encounter. This isn’t just an ordinary horseback ride. You’ll learn to project your intentions and build self-awareness and confidence by guiding one of these majestic animals.

12:30pm

Continue your discovery of self-awareness with a sun salutation (among many other poses) in one of our many yoga classes, or in a guided meditation class. Let go, suspend your judgment, and uncover a whole new side to your consciousness.

1:30pm

Return to Jean’s Kitchen for a light and delicious lunch.

2:00pm

We highly recommend learning the Texas Two-Step. It’s not only a great workout and ridiculously fun, it’s also a glimpse at true Texas culture. Depending on the day’s activity schedule, you can also follow the Two-Step with one of our many culinary demonstrations.

4:00pm

It’s time to unwind and work out the kinks and stresses that you have been piling up. Head to the Spa at Travaasa Austin and choose from our extensive menu of body treatments, facials, massages and holistic healing remedies. Overwhelmed with choices? Start with our signature juniper and olive stone exfoliation massage.

6:00pm

Watch the evening sun settle toward the horizon with a cocktail in hand on the Mesquite Patio. Follow it with an exceptional dinner in Jean’s Kitchen.
page.thumbCaption: A perfect day at Travaasa Austin
